name: 2024 6th Asia Conference on Machine Learning and Computing
content: Conference Proceedings: Submissions will be reviewed by the conference technical committees, and accepted papers will be published in Conference Proceedings and submitted to EI Compendex, Scopus, etc for indexing. Journal: Selected papers will be published in International Journal of Machine Learning and Computing as a special issue, which will be indexed by Inspec (IET), Google Scholar, Crossref, ProQuest, Electronic Journals Library, CNKI.
